about_the_game:
Bright, modern and unconventional interior design. Each picture is a unique choice and vision of amazing people. Enjoy a selection of incredible designs.

For a comfortable passage of this game, we have made a lot of useful tools. It is possible to save progress at any time, as well as select and adjust the level of difficulty. There are tips and the right tools for passing the level. Thanks to this game is suitable for beginners in puzzles and real professionals.

In the game you will see impressive designs of living rooms, terraces, bathrooms and other spaces. Perhaps you'll pick up creative ideas for your own home, decorate the space around you. Enjoy the unique creativity now in the new game "1001 Puzzles. Interior Design".

- 500 high quality pictures
- Sophisticated game mode: handy hints, sorting and a magnifier
- Individual difficulty settings for each puzzle allow you to play forever
- feature to turn off the rotation of puzzle pieces
- Possibility to save and continue a puzzle at any moment
- pleasant relaxing music
- For those who like excitement - special tasks and colorful trophies
